import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import lottie from'lottie-web';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AnimatedSticker(){const containerRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{let animation=null;if(containerRef.current){// Загружаем стикер из Telegram
fetch('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/telegram/tgstickers/main/stickers/Resistance/Resistance_01.tgs').then(response=>response.arrayBuffer()).then(buffer=>{const uint8Array=new Uint8Array(buffer);return import('pako').then(pako=>{const decompressed=pako.inflate(uint8Array,{to:'string'});return JSON.parse(decompressed);});}).then(animationData=>{animation=lottie.loadAnimation({container:containerRef.current,renderer:'svg',loop:true,autoplay:true,animationData});}).catch(error=>{console.error('Ошибка при загрузке стикера:',error);});}return()=>{if(animation){animation.destroy();}};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:containerRef,style:{width:'200px',height:'200px',margin:'0 auto'}});}export default AnimatedSticker;
